   D.Anil SaiKrishna 
   */

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define lld long long int
#define gx getchar
#define pb push_back
#define in insert
#define mp make_pair
#define inf 2000000000
#define mod 1000000007

void scan(int &x)
{
    register int c = gx();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gx());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gx())
    {
        x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;
    }
}
lld modu(lld a,lld b,lld c)
{
	lld res=1;
	while(b>0)
	{
		if(b&1)
			res=(res*a)%c;
		b=b>>1;
		a=(a*a)%c;
	}
	return res%c;
}
lld arr[1007];
void solve()
{
	lld j,cnt;
	for(lld i=1;i<=1000;i++)
	{
		cnt=0; j=i;
		while(j>0)
		{
			if(j%2==1)
				cnt++;
			j=j>>1;
		}
		arr[i]=arr[i-1]+cnt;
	}
}
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);
	solve();
	lld t,n;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		cout<<arr[n]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
